creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and gift of the Souls Grown Deep Foundation from the William S. Arnett Collection
image_copyright: © Nellie Mae Abrams / Artists Rights Society (ARS), New York
text: A rectangular quilt, 82 by 72 inches in size, is decorated with rectangular strips of fabric arranged in square-like, concentric formations in varying shades of gray, white, blue and yellow. One half of the square contains darker strips of fabric, while lighter shades dominate the other half, approximating something like a traditional “sunshine & shadow” variation block pattern.
title: "Housetop" quilt
